txt.en: You have turned in a stack of trophies for a modest reward suitable for a collector such as yourself.
Wanted: Soft skin from the beasts south and east of Esteldín. Deliver the items to Ferrif within Esteldín.
'We will do what we can to keep everyone in clothing and shoes. Thank you.'
'The soft skin taken from beasts can be used for boots and shoes for those not looking for the sturdiness needed by adventurous types.'
Rangers of Esteldín Task: Soft Skin
Ferrif, a Ranger, has asked for a collection of soft skin to be delivered to him at the Ranger's home at Esteldín.
Deliver the soft skin to Ferrif in Esteldín
You have accepted a task to collect soft skin from the beasts in the area surrounding Esteldín to the east and south. Once collected, you are to deliver the items to Ferrif within Esteldín.
Wanted: Soft skin from the beasts south and east of Esteldín.
